jobActions.name: Heavy Swing
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 220.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Maim
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 190.
Combo Action: Heavy Swing
Combo Potency: 340
Combo Bonus: Increases Beast Gauge by 10
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Berserk
jobActions.description:
Grants 3 stacks of Berserk, each stack guaranteeing weaponskill attacks are critical and direct hits.
Increases damage dealt when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Extends Surging Tempest duration by 10s to a maximum of 60s

jobActions.name: Overpower
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Defiance
jobActions.description:
Significantly increases enmity generation.
Effect ends upon reuse.

jobActions.name: Release Defiance
jobActions.description: Cancels the effect of Defiance.

jobActions.name: Tomahawk
jobActions.description:
Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 150.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity

jobActions.name: Storm's Path
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Combo Action: Maim
Combo Potency: 480
Combo Bonus: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 250
Combo Bonus: Increases Beast Gauge by 20
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Thrill of Battle
jobActions.description:
Increases maximum HP by 20% and restores the amount increased.
Additional Effect: Increases HP recovery via healing actions on self by 20%
Duration: 10s

jobActions.name: Inner Beast
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 330.
Beast Gauge Cost: 50

jobActions.name: Vengeance
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by 30% and delivers an attack with a potency of 55 every time you suffer physical damage.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Mythril Tempest
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Combo Action: Overpower
Combo Potency: 140
Combo Bonus: Grants Surging Tempest, increasing damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends Surging Tempest duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Combo Bonus: Increases Beast Gauge by 20
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Holmgang
jobActions.description:
Brace yourself for an enemy onslaught, preventing most attacks from reducing your HP to less than 1.
Duration: 10s
When a target is selected, halts their movement with chains.

jobActions.name: Steel Cyclone
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160 to all nearby enemies.
Beast Gauge Cost: 50
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Storm's Eye
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Combo Action: Maim
Combo Potency: 480
Combo Bonus: Grants Surging Tempest, increasing damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends Surging Tempest duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Combo Bonus: Increases Beast Gauge by 10
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Infuriate
jobActions.description:
Increases Beast Gauge by 50.
Additional Effect: Grants Nascent Chaos
Duration: 30s
Nascent Chaos Effect: When Beast Gauge is 50 or greater, changes Decimate to Chaotic Cyclone and Fell Cleave to Inner Chaos
Maximum Charges: 2
Can only be executed while in combat.

jobActions.name: Fell Cleave
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 580.
Beast Gauge Cost: 50
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Raw Intuition
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by 10%.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: Restores HP with each weaponskill successfully delivered
Cure Potency: 400
Shares a recast timer with Nascent Flash.

jobActions.name: Equilibrium
jobActions.description:
Restores own HP.
Cure Potency: 1,200
Additional Effect: Gradually restores HP
Cure Potency: 200
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Decimate
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack to all nearby enemies with a potency of 180.
Beast Gauge Cost: 50
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Onslaught
jobActions.description:
Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 150.
Maximum Charges: 3
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Upheaval
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 400.
Shares a recast timer with Orogeny.

jobActions.name: Shake It Off
jobActions.description:
Creates a barrier around self and all nearby party members that absorbs damage totaling 15% of maximum HP.
Dispels Thrill of Battle, Damnation, and Bloodwhetting, increasing damage absorbed by 2% for each effect removed.
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Gradually restores HP
Cure Potency: 100
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Restores target's HP
Cure Potency: 300
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Inner Release
jobActions.description:
Grants 3 stacks of Inner Release, each stack allowing the use of Fell Cleave or Decimate without cost and guaranteeing they are critical and direct hits.
Increases damage dealt when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.
Additional Effect: Grants Inner Strength, nullifying Stun, Sleep, Bind, Heavy, and most knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Extends Surging Tempest duration by 10s to a maximum of 60s
Additional Effect: Grants Primal Rend Ready
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Burgeoning Fury upon successfully landing Fell Cleave or Decimate, up to a maximum of 3
At maximum stacks, become Wrathful, changing Inner Release to Primal Wrath.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Chaotic Cyclone
jobActions.description:
Delivers a critical direct hit with a potency of 300 to all nearby enemies.
Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.
Additional Effect: Reduces the recast time of Infuriate by 5 seconds
Beast Gauge Cost: 50
Can only be executed while under the effect of Nascent Chaos. Effect fades upon execution.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Decimate changes to Chaotic Cyclone when requirements for execution are met.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Nascent Flash
jobActions.description:
Grants Nascent Flash to self and Nascent Glint to target party member.
Nascent Flash Effect: Restores HP with each weaponskill successfully delivered
Cure Potency: 400
Nascent Glint Effect: Restores HP equaling 100% of that recovered by Nascent Flash while also reducing damage taken by 10%
Duration: 8s
Additional Effect: Grants Stem the Flow to target, reducing damage taken by 10%
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Stem the Tide to target, nullifying damage equivalent to a heal of 400 potency
Duration: 20s
Shares a recast timer with Bloodwhetting.

jobActions.name: Inner Chaos
jobActions.description:
Delivers a critical direct hit with a potency of 660.
Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.
Additional Effect: Reduces the recast time of Infuriate by 5 seconds
Beast Gauge Cost: 50
Can only be executed while under the effect of Nascent Chaos. Effect fades upon execution.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Fell Cleave changes to Inner Chaos when requirements for execution are met.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Bloodwhetting
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by 10%.
Duration: 8s
Additional Effect: Restores HP with each weaponskill successfully delivered
Cure Potency: 400
Additional Effect: Grants Stem the Flow
Stem the Flow Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10%
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Stem the Tide
Stem the Tide Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 400 potency
Duration: 20s
Shares a recast timer with Nascent Flash.

jobActions.name: Orogeny
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all nearby enemies.
Shares a recast timer with Upheaval.

jobActions.name: Primal Rend
jobActions.description:
Jumps to the target and delivers a critical direct hit to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 700 for the first enemy, and 70% less for all remaining enemies.
Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.
Additional Effect: Grants Primal Ruination Ready
Duration: 20s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Primal Rend Ready, granted by Inner Release.
Cannot be executed while bound.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Damnation
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by 40% and delivers an attack with a potency of 55 every time you suffer physical damage.
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Grants Primeval Impulse when the effect expires or damage is taken
Primeval Impulse Effect: Healing over time
Cure Potency: 300
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Primal Wrath
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack to all nearby enemies with a potency of 700 for the first enemy, and 70% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed when Wrathful.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Inner Release changes to Primal Wrath when requirements for execution are met.

jobActions.name: Primal Ruination
jobActions.description:
Delivers a critical direct hit to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 780 for the first enemy, and 70% less for all remaining enemies.
Increases damage dealt when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Primal Ruination Ready.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Primal Rend changes to Primal Ruination when requirements for execution are met.

roleActions.name: Rampart
roleActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by 20%.
Additional Effect: Increases HP recovery via healing actions on self by 15%
Duration: 20s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

roleActions.name: Provoke
roleActions.description: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list while gaining additional enmity.

roleActions.name: Interject
roleActions.description: Interrupts the use of a target's action.

roleActions.name: Reprisal
roleActions.description:
Reduces damage dealt by nearby enemies by 10%.
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

roleActions.name: Arm's Length
roleActions.description:
Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck
Duration: 15s

roleActions.name: Shirk
roleActions.description: Diverts 25% of enmity to target party member.

traits.name: Tank Mastery
traits.description: Reduces damage taken by 20%. Furthermore, grants a bonus to maximum HP based on your vitality attribute, and a bonus to damage dealt based on your strength attribute.

traits.name: The Beast Within
traits.description: Increases Beast Gauge when landing Maim or Storm's Path in a combo.

traits.name: Inner Beast Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Inner Beast to Fell Cleave.

traits.name: Enhanced Infuriate
traits.description: Reduces Infuriate recast time by 5 seconds upon landing Fell Cleave or Decimate on most targets.

traits.name: Nascent Chaos
traits.description:
Infuriate grants the effect of Nascent Chaos, upgrading Decimate to Chaotic Cyclone when the Beast Gauge is 50 or greater. Upon reaching level 80, Nascent Chaos will also upgrade Fell Cleave to Inner Chaos.
Duration: 30s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Mastering the Beast
traits.description: Increases Beast Gauge when landing Mythril Tempest in a combo.

traits.name: Enhanced Shake It Off
traits.description:
Adds a healing effect to Shake It Off.
Cure Potency: 300

traits.name: Enhanced Thrill of Battle
traits.description: Adds an additional effect to Thrill of Battle that increases HP recovery via healing actions by 20%.

traits.name: Enhanced Nascent Flash
traits.description:
Extends the duration of Nascent Flash and Nascent Glint to 8 seconds.
Grants Stem the Flow to target, reducing damage taken by 10%.
Duration: 4s
Grants Stem the Tide to target, nullifying damage equivalent to a heal of 400 potency.
Duration: 20s

traits.name: Enhanced Equilibrium
traits.description:
Grants healing over time to self.
Cure Potency: 200
Duration: 15s

traits.name: Melee Mastery
traits.description: Increases the potency of Heavy Swing to 200, Maim to 150, Storm's Path to 160, and Storm's Eye to 160.

traits.name: Enhanced Onslaught
traits.description: Allows a third charge of Onslaught.

traits.name: Melee Mastery II
traits.description: Increases the potency of Heavy Swing to 220, Maim to 190, Storm's Path to 200, Storm's Eye to 200, and Fell Cleave to 580.

traits.name: Enhanced Inner Release
traits.description:
Grants a stack of Burgeoning Fury upon landing Fell Cleave or Decimate while under the effect of Inner Release.
Duration: 30s
Maximum Stacks: 3
At maximum stacks, become Wrathful, upgrading Inner Release to Primal Wrath.

traits.name: Enhanced Primal Rend
traits.description:
Grants the effect of Primal Ruination Ready after executing Primal Rend.
Duration: 20s
